Uses of Class
org.opends.server.replication.server.ServerHandler

  • Packages that use ServerHandler 
    Package Description
    org.opends.server.replication.server
    This package contains the code for the Replication Server part of the Multimaster replication feature.

    • Uses of ServerHandler in org.opends.server.replication.server

      Subclasses of ServerHandler in org.opends.server.replication.server 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataServerHandler
      This class defines a server handler, which handles all interaction with a peer server (RS or DS).
      class  ReplicationServerHandler
      This class defines a server handler, which handles all interaction with a peer replication server.
